name: Row Runner
description:
Genre: 2D Endless Runner/Shooter

Programmer(s): Nolan Roach

Artist(s): Nolan

Engine: Unity 5

Platform(s): Windows

This game was pitched to me by my friend. I liked the concept so much that I made a design document and schedule to work on it during the summer of 2015. However; I decided to suspend working on the project indefinitely due to: getting a new job and still attending summer school. The only thing that I accomplished to make is a tech demo featuring some of the character art that I created after working on it for around a week. The pitch in it's entirety and a demo download link can be found below.
